translations: n.共济会；共济会会员（freemason 的复数）

phrs.translation: 共济会会员, 同济会员, 表演者, 共济会
共济会普林斯霍尔分会

sentences.sentence: Four years ago, he joined the Norwegian Order of Freemasons.
sentences.translation: 四年前，他加入了挪威互济会。

sentences.sentence: But he kept working, becoming the manager and secretary for the local Shriners, a group similar to the Freemasons, a position he held until he was 99.
sentences.translation: 但是他一直坚持工作，后来成为当地的圣地兄弟会(类似于共济会的一个组织)的经理兼秘书，在这个岗位上他工作到99岁。

sentences.sentence: Classmate Google is the freemasons, ten years old. In order to help Chinese search, and the cause of the freemasons dispatch, it came to China without any hesitation miles.
sentences.translation: 谷歌同学是美国共济会成员，十来岁了，为了帮助中国的搜索事业，受和美国共济会的派遣，不远万里，来到中国。
